languages.text: Чиновник Администратума обещает предоставить документы на имя Фиделио, если Вольный Торговец поможет ему спасти ценный груз из печи крематория.
The Administratum clerk promises to provide the Rogue Trader with documents made out in the name Fidelio if {mf|he|she} helps him rescue some valuable cargo from the crematorium's furnace.
languages.original_text: Чиновник Администратума обещает предоставить документы на имя Фиделио, если Вольный Торговец поможет ему спасти ценный груз из печи крематория.

traits.locale_text: The Administratum clerk promises to provide the Rogue Trader with documents made out in the name Fidelio if {mf|he|she} helps him rescue some valuable cargo from the crematorium's furnace.
The Administratum clerk promises to provide you with documents made out in the name Fidelio if you help him rescue some valuable cargo from the crematorium's furnace.

The Administratum clerk promises to provide the Rogue Trader with documents made out in the name Fidelio if {mf|he|she} helps him rescue some valuable cargo from the crematorium's furnace.

languages.text: 内政部的文员承诺，只要行商浪人帮助他从火葬场的炉子里抢出一批值钱的货物，他就愿意提供所有以菲迪奥的名义签发的文件。
languages.original_text: The Administratum clerk promises to provide the Rogue Trader with documents made out in the name Fidelio if {mf|he|she} helps him rescue some valuable cargo from the crematorium's furnace.

traits.locale_text: 内政部的文员承诺，只要行商浪人帮助他从火葬场的炉子里抢出一批值钱的货物，他就愿意提供所有以菲迪奥的名义签发的文件。
内政部的文员答应你，只要你帮助他从火葬场的炉子里抢出一批值钱的货物，他就愿意向你提供所有以菲迪奥的名义签发的文件。

languages.text: 帝国行政局の担当者は、火葬場の炉から貴重な貨物を救い出す手伝いをしてくれれば、フィデリオの名前で作成された書類を自由開拓者に提供すると約束した。
languages.original_text: The Administratum clerk promises to provide the Rogue Trader with documents made out in the name Fidelio if {mf|he|she} helps him rescue some valuable cargo from the crematorium's furnace.

traits.locale_text: 帝国行政局の担当者は、火葬場の炉から貴重な貨物を救い出す手伝いをしてくれれば、フィデリオの名前で作成された書類を自由開拓者に提供すると約束した。
帝国行政局の担当者は、火葬場の炉から貴重な貨物を救い出すのを手伝ってくれれば、フィデリオの名前で作成された書類を提供すると約束する。

languages.text: El funcionario del Administratum promete proporcionar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente documentos con el nombre de Fidelio si le ayuda a recuperar unos objetos valiosos del horno del crematorio.
languages.original_text: The Administratum clerk promises to provide the Rogue Trader with documents made out in the name Fidelio if {mf|he|she} helps him rescue some valuable cargo from the crematorium's furnace.

traits.locale_text: El funcionario del Administratum promete proporcionar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente documentos con el nombre de Fidelio si le ayuda a recuperar unos objetos valiosos del horno del crematorio.

languages.text: Der Sekretär des Administratums hat versprochen, {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} auf den Namen Fidelio ausgestellte Dokumente zur Verfügung zu stellen, wenn {mf|er|sie} ihm hilft, eine wertvolle Fracht aus dem Ofen des Krematoriums zu retten.
languages.original_text: The Administratum clerk promises to provide the Rogue Trader with documents made out in the name Fidelio if {mf|he|she} helps him rescue some valuable cargo from the crematorium's furnace.

traits.locale_text: Der Sekretär des Administratums hat versprochen, dir auf den Namen Fidelio ausgestellte Dokumente zur Verfügung zu stellen, wenn du ihm Hilfst, eine wertvolle Fracht aus dem Ofen des Krematoriums zu retten.

Der Sekretär des Administratums hat versprochen, dir auf den Namen Fidelio ausgestellte Dokumente zur Verfügung zu stellen, wenn du ihm Hilfst, eine wertvolle Fracht aus dem Ofen des Krematoriums zu retten.

languages.text: Le greffier de l'Administratum promet de fournir {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} les documents au nom de Fidélio {mf|s'il|si elle} l'aide à récupérer une cargaison de valeur dans le four crématoire.
languages.original_text: The Administratum clerk promises to provide the Rogue Trader with documents made out in the name Fidelio if {mf|he|she} helps him rescue some valuable cargo from the crematorium's furnace.

languages.text: Administratum kâtibi, krematoryum fırınındaki değerli mallarını kurtarıp ona getirirse Hür Tacir'e Fidelio adına yazılan belgeleri temin etme sözünü verdi.
